title: A Day's Worth of Menu Ideas for Mother's Day
description: We've gathered loads of top-rated recipes for your Mother's Day menu, featuring brunch, lunch, dinner, and dessert recipes, too.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE A Day's Worth of Menu Ideas for Mother's Day Serve up impressive, delicious recipes to mom all day long on her special day. By Carl Hanson Carl Hanson Carl Hanson is a Senior Editor at Allrecipes who has been writing about food and wine for nearly 20 years. He enjoys creating content that informs, entertains, and assists busy home cooks get nourishing meals on the table for their families. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Updated on April 18, 2023 Close Credits: waimea16 Mom makes so many yummy meals for you- now return the favor! We'll make it easy on you, with recipes that are delicious and impressive but also simple to make. And since Mom's big day is all day long, we're offering more than the obligatory Mother's Day brunch ideas. We've gathered loads of top-rated recipes for your Mother's Day menu, featuring brunch, lunch, dinner, and dessert recipes, too. 01 of 15 Breakfast: Classic Waffles View Recipe Save PARKER71 Let's start with a simple breakfast classic. "These waffles are super easy and delicious," says Janet. "My 12 year-old daughter makes them all the time." Enjoy with warm maple syrup and sliced fruit. 02 of 15 Breakfast: Vanilla Berry Parfaits View Recipe Save OkinawanPrincess Here's a treat that works for brunch or for a light dessert, too. "Delicious and easy, this is a fabulous mix of berries and yogurt," raves Rebecca. "If you like, you can make a thin layer of graham crackers or granola in each vanilla/berry layer. That gives it a little more crunch." 03 of 15 Breakfast: Chef John's Baked Eggs View Recipe Save Jennifer Baker Truth be told, this recipe would be delicious for any Mother's Day meal -- breakfast, lunch, and even dinner. "If you enjoy huevos rancheros, you will love this," says Chef John. "The way the spicy sauce mingles with just barely set eggs is very similar, and when you start scooping this up with toasted chunks of bread, it gets borderline magical." These 12 Easy Baked Egg Recipes Are a Lazy Cook's Dream 04 of 15 Breakfast: Homemade Breakfast Sausage View Recipe Save TraciAnn and BB Add this savory, sugary sausage to Mom's special breakfast and watch her eyes light up with each bite. Plus, this classic breakfast option is ready in 20 minutes, so you don't have to worry about setting aside extra time to prepare it. 05 of 15 Lunch: Crispy Grilled Pizza Margherita View Recipe Save Baking Nana This simple recipe is even easier if you start with a prepared pizza crust. "Pizza on an outdoor grill is a great alternative to oven-cooked pizza," says OXSALIDA. "If you love crispy crust, this is for you. Note: cook time is relatively short, so alternative toppings like uncooked sausage or other meats may not cook fully." 06 of 15 Lunch: Creamy Smoked Salmon Pasta View Recipe Save chibi chef "This is a lighter version of pasta carbonara," says DEBNJAMES. "For people who want the flavor but not the bacon, smoked salmon is the perfect substitute!" 07 of 15 Lunch: Easy One-Pot Chicken Alfredo View Recipe Save Kim This Easy One-Pot Chicken Alfredo dish is perfect for Mother's Day lunch. Not only is it ready in 30 minutes, but you can make the entire dish in one pot. And, since you'll be using ingredients such as garlic, onions, basil, oregano, etc.- there's no second-guessing the amazing flavor that this simple recipe has to offer. 08 of 15 Lunch: Old-Fashioned Strawberry Pretzel Salad View Recipe Save pomplemousse Dessert or salad? Trick question: it's both. A terrific sweet something for lunch or dinner. It's also great with raspberries. "This was a great success," says Tricia Simone. "It was easy, and comes out delicious. Just leave yourself enough time to let the top layer set." 09 of 15 Dinner: Chef John's Salt Roasted Chicken View Recipe Save BIG BOY A roast chicken is just about as simple as it gets. With this recipe, a whole chicken roasts till it's crisp and brown with nothing more than a generous sprinkling of salt. "You're going to be so shocked at how flavorful, juicy, and amazing this roast chicken comes out," says Chef John. 10 of 15 Dinner: Baked Shrimp Scampi View Recipe Save naples34102 Impress mom with a simple and quick shrimp scampi with butter, white wine, and garlic plus bread crumbs and a dash of cayenne. "I thought this was the best shrimp scampi I have ever tasted!" raves Melanie. "It was so easy to make and worth every bite." 14 Shrimp Skillet Dinners for Weeknight Meals 11 of 15 Dinner: Couscous Primavera View Recipe Save Allrecipes Magazine Complete your Mother's Day menu with fresh asparagus, peas, and couscous. "I'm borrowing the name from Pasta Primavera which, like this recipe, takes advantage of fresh, seasonal, green produce," says Chef John. "This is a healthy, delicious, and easy side dish that takes about 10 minutes to make." 12 of 15 Dessert: Buttermilk Strawberry Shortcake View Recipe Save sweetserenade Delicious fresh strawberries top a light biscuit. Crown it with whipped cream, and you've made Mom's day. "Great simple, easy, and delicious recipe," says Shearone. "I sliced some of the strawberries ahead of time in order for the juice to form." 13 of 15 Dessert: Sweet and Simple Lemon Tart View Recipe Save lutzflcat Combine simple ingredients (butter, eggs, flour, sugar, and fresh lemon) to create this lovely tart with a fresh, light flavor. "Excellent!" raves mengtx. "I've made a lot of tarts and this was a great easy recipe and the results looked very pro, tasted fantastic! This was such an outstanding success." Our 21 Best Lemon Desserts 14 of 15 Dessert: Pineapple Upside Down Cupcakes View Recipe Save waimea16 These Mother's Day cakes are upside down and individually portioned. "I love to make these little guys for family gatherings or just as treats for home," says Bri. "Easy recipe to make. Adaptations can be made to make this completely from scratch. This is just a yummy simplified version!" 15 of 15 More Inspiration 20 Recipes for a Special Mother's Day Dinner Explore more: Recipes Holidays and Events Recipes Mother's Day Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
